summary: Adds an Oblivion-style on-screen message box when first emerging into the Skyrim wilderness.
descriptionHtml:
===========================================
HELGEN EXIT ON-SCREEN MESSAGE by StannieDum
===========================================


===========
DESCRIPTION
===========

I personally liked the on-screen \'Good Luck\' message box you received when emerging from the sewers at the start of \'Oblivion\' and was sorry that Skyrim never had one.

This mod adds such a message when you first venture out into the wilderness from the caves beneath Helgen at the start of the game and is automatically activated on completion of the \'Unbound\' quest after Alduin flies off.


=============
INSTRUCTIONS
=============

Place the \'ExitMessage.esp\' and the \'scripts\' folder in Skyrim\'s Data directory, make sure the plug-in is enabled in the Launcher and you\'re good to go. To uninstall, simply delete the files.


====
NOTE
====

If you have the Creation Kit installed, you will already have a \'scripts\' folder in the \'Data\' directory, and it will contain a version of the \'QF_MQ101_0003372B.pex\' file. As this mod will overwrite this file with a modified version, you may wish to back up the original file first.


StannieDum
9 February 2012
author: StannieDum
